meta.name: description
meta.content: Our mission is to inspire and prepare all students with the confidence, courage and competence to achieve their dreams; contribute to community; and engage in a lifetime of learning.

li.a: Talent Development, Academic Challenge and Gifted Support

Weaver Lake Elementary: A Science, Math & Technology School

img.alt: Explore our award-winning arts programming at Birch Grove Elementary School for the Arts.
img.div:
TAKE THE STAGE
Explore our award-winning arts programming at Birch Grove Elementary School for the Arts.

img.alt: STEM and STEAM magnet programs at Weaver Lake Elementary, Zanewood Community School, and Brooklyn Middle School weave science, technology, engineering, arts and math concepts throughout the school day.
img.div:
EXPLORE STEM/STEAM
STEM and STEAM magnet programs at Weaver Lake Elementary, Zanewood Community School, and Brooklyn Middle School weave science, technology, engineering, arts and math concepts throughout the school day.

img.alt: Osseo Area Schools students experience unparalleled learning opportunities—in the classroom, in the community, on stage and on the field.
img.div:
OPPORTUNITIES TO THRIVE
Osseo Area Schools students experience unparalleled learning opportunities—in the classroom, in the community, on stage and on the field.

img.alt: Mission-driven staff support all scholars as they find their path in Osseo Area Schools.
img.div:
SUPPORT TO GROW
Mission-driven staff support all scholars as they find their path in Osseo Area Schools.

img.alt: Strong partnerships provide Osseo Area Schools students with opportunities to dig deeper into learning, give back to their communities, and round out their educational experience.
img.div:
PARTNERSHIPS TO EXPAND LEARNING
Strong partnerships provide Osseo Area Schools students with opportunities to dig deeper into learning, give back to their communities, and round out their educational experience.

img.alt: We're proud to be the only Minnesota school district to earn a Best Communities for Music Education designation every year since 2009.
img.div:
MUSIC TO OUR EARS
We're proud to be the only Minnesota school district to earn a Best Communities for Music Education designation every year since 2009.

div.p: Welcome to Osseo Area Schools! Enrollments are accepted on an ongoing basis, so enroll now.
Find instructions and login access for FeePay, ParentVUE and Schoology for parents, all in one central location.
What’s for breakfast and lunch? Our schools offer nutritious meals to encourage healthy eating.
